Title: Keep firmly in mind the hatred of blood and tears, keep the gun firmly in hand
Designer: Revolutionary Committee of the Nanjing Film Equipment Factory (南京电影机械厂革命委员会)
Publisher: Revolutionary Committee of the Jiangsu Provincial Publication Office (江苏省革命委员会出版发行局)
Notes: The images in the background may be from the Rent Collection Courtyard, a famous Cultural Revolution sculptural assemblage depicting the old society.More on this group of spectacular statues and its origin can be found in Denise Y. Ho & Jie Li, "From Landlord Manor to Red Memorabilia: Reincarnations of a Chinese Museum Town", Modern China (2015), 1-35.
